title: Sir Chris Hoy Breaks Leg in Bike Crash
summary: Sir Chris Hoy is a famous Olympic cyclist who won many gold medals. He recently had a bad crash while riding his mountain bike and broke his leg. He is now using crutches and says it was the worst crash he has ever had in his 43 years of cycling. Chris Hoy is also dealing with a serious illness called cancer, but he still enjoys riding his bike. He says the crash happened because he doesn't bounce back like he did when he was younger. Despite this, he is doing better now and is looking forward to Christmas. He wants to live his life fully and enjoy every moment.
